alert.note: Alert for Caddo (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 16 at 10:31PM CDT until March 17 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN WEBSTER...SOUTHWESTERN CADDO AND NORTHERN BOSSIER PARISHES... At 1031 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Plain Dealing to near Blanchard, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Shreveport, Bossier City, Greenwood, Blanchard, Benton, Sarepta, Dixie, Alden Bridge, Rocky Mount, Ferguson, Linton, Cross Lake and Ivan. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for northwestern Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
